Payout.label: Payout Amount
Payout.tooltip: Amount of points to give users when they share the "i'm new message "

Message.value: Welcome to the stream {0}! Here have {1} {2} <3
Message.label: Message
Message.tooltip:
Message to send, if left blank this message will not be sent! 
{0} = Username
{1} = Amount of points added
{2} = Currencyname

Log.label: Enable logging
Log.tooltip: Log new viewers in the log.txt

LogFormat.label: Log format
LogFormat.tooltip:
Format the entries of the logfile
{0} = username
{1} = amount of points added
{2} = currencyname

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
